document.masterDocTitle: New species and additional records of Lomechusini from the Palaearctic region, primarily from China (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

Comment :
Drusilla heydeni
is widespread in Middle Asia, where it is the most common representative of the genus (
ASSING 2005a
, 2008a , 2011 ).
